learningSummary.title: Summary: Problems with unstructured content
learningSummary.shortdesc: This topic recaps of some of the problems encountered when content is unstructured.

lcSummary.title: Summary
lcSummary.p: Using structure or unstructured content is a choice that largely depends on the purpose of the content you want to present. For technical writing or learning writing environments, not using structured content can lead to problems.

lcObjectives.title: Objectives
lcObjectives.lcObjectivesStem: You now know how to do the following:

lcObjectivesGroup.lcObjective: State some disadvantages of using unstructured content.
State why unstructured content is not easily reused.
State examples of why unstructured content poses problems for collaborative writing environments and for readers of such content.
Describe some difficulties associated with the automated processing of unstructured content.

lcNextSteps.title: Next steps
lcNextSteps.p: Read the design and language specification for DITA learning and training content for more details on how the DITA learning content specialization can benefit your organization.
